inclusion.criterion: Eighteen years of age or older at screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Naive to treatment for hepatitis C or treatment experienced on previous IFN-containing treatment for chronic HCV infection.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women are allowed to participate if they agree to always use at least two forms of birth control.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior history of any of the following: Clinically significant illness (other than HCV) or any other major medical disorder that may interfere with the subject treatment, assessment of compliance with the protocol;
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal disorder with post-operative condition that could interfere with the absorption of the study drug
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and the recent coinfection with HBV. His past medical history is non-significant.
